评论详情: Excelente confección y calidad, lindo

评论概述: Cole Haan Women's Belted Wool Coat
评论详情: Very nice coat with pretty price! Love its color - castleton green, which suits my skin tone. I got this at a very reasonable price and the quality is as expected. If you are considering it, don't hesitate!
Nice color, but Unfortunately have to return, not true to size

It smelled like gasoline. It triggered my allergy, and needed to use an inhaler. It came in a clear bag and the color of the jacket transferred to the bag. I received it today and I am returning it immediately. I don't even think it's a real one. also it came without a belt. I can't believe it was shipped in this condition
Returned. Not at all flattering. If you are tall and thin and shaped like a model… then MAYBE. Frumpy on every other body type.

Nice looking coat but very itchy. I have the same coat I purchased in the store without the itchy feeling. There are also 2 buttons without holes or loops. One is on the inside and the other on the outside. It’s going back.

评论概述: Color of coat is falsely advertised
评论详情: Compare the advertised color of the coat to the actual product. Keep in mind that the color black is not an option to chose from when ordering.
Warm and substantial wool coat. Lovely neckline drape.

评论概述: Beautiful Coat but Fit is Off
评论详情: Be warned - The arm and shoulder openings are small and a bit tight, sadly, but everywhere else is a great fit. I don’t think a bigger size will help because it will then be too large everywhere else.  As others noted the charcoal color is not as pictured, it is much darker. I didn’t mind as I was looking for closer to black. I ordered a size 4, I’m 5’2” and 135 lbs. I’m disappointed in the arm (dis)proportions especially considering the higher price tag. How is one supposed to wear sweaters and other winter clothing underneath? Thankfully the coat is lined and I think I will be warm. The collar is very classy, and the length goes to my knees. I am going to keep it as I need it for a last minute work trip to a colder climate, but buyer beware that the arm opening is quite slimmer than the rest of the coat’s fit.

评论概述: Gorgeous coat, but expect a darker grey
评论详情: The coat is absolutely gorgeous and chic. My only complaint is that it’s a dark charcoal grey instead of the medium grey in the pics, however it looks really nice so i don’t mind!

评论概述: Totally different color than the picture on the website
评论详情: It’s a very nice piece but I like the color shows on the website much better.
The charcoal jacket in the photo is grey, however it’s black in reality. Aside from that it nicely form fitting and good quality.
Beautiful fabric elegant coat

This is a beautiful, elegant, coat and is very high quality. The charcoal color is much darker than shown here, but still lovely. The coat runs very small - I am normally a 4/6 and got a 10, which fit perfectly. You can find the full size chart on the Cole Haan website. The sleeves are wonderfully long, a little over 31 inches.

This coat looks nothing like the image.  It’s a really dark charcoal with a super narrow fit.  I wear a size 8, M in clothes and I could hardly get my arms in the sleeves.  It’s too tight, too narrow and too dark.  This is a big NO for me.

评论概述: Beautiful but… charcoal is almost black!
评论详情: This is a gorgeous n flattering coat but be forewarned, if you’re looking for a dark grey, the charcoal reads black. I definitely didn’t need another black dress coat and I’m pretty disappointed that the color looks nothing like it does in the image online but I will keep it because I only paid $75 for it and it’s an extremely high quality coat.
Fantastic quality and model. However, I found it running small. Unfortunately, I had to return it, otherwise, I totally recommend it.
Great fabric, very worm and soft. Very flatering. I am size 10 and it is Just true to size.
Beautiful color
Ordered this for my daughter, 23.  She loves it, elegant.  The blue is prettier in person.  She said she feels like Cinderella in it.  It is soft , not itchy and warm.
Beautiful fake coat. I only wore it 3 times and this is what it looks like. Literally falling apart. (J am 115 lb and the coat was lose not tight at all.) So disappointed.
Ive been looking for this color and finally found it.  This coat is so BEAUTIFUL!! LOVE IT!!!!!
Just what I have been looking for.  As expected and more. Runs true to size
Very pretty color and fit.

评论概述: Order a size up if you’re going to wear layers
评论详情: I am 5’5” and 125 pounds—ordered a size 4 which is a little tight in the shoulders, especially with a thicker sweater.  Overall, I really like the style and it is very warm!
I absolutely love this coat. Very comfortable, stylish, and warm. Easy to wear with jeans or a nice dress.
It’s a beautiful wool coat,worth every penny.
Fits large, dirty belt, the difference in color. Returning.

This coat is beautiful.  Was a Christmas gift.  I wore it Christmas day receiving complements and every single time I wear it, someone comments on it.  Have the powder blue.  Only strange thing is there is a button on the inside waist flap but no button hole nor loop.  And at the chest under one of the lapels, there is a button but again no loop (as if you could cross the lapel over for warmth but no way to secure it) and there is a spare button on the inside that doesn't match the other buttons on the coat.  The seamstress must have had a sense of humor.  This is a lovely coat.  Maybe sized a tad large, so if you normally wear a 6 or and 8, choose the 6.
Very beautiful coat. Heavy wool, perfect to wear in extremely cold weather. It fits snug, so order one size up.
The material is very itchy .
False advertisement! The coat I received was knee length. I’m 5’4” for reference. The coat pictured is long calf length. The quality is good but I was expecting a long coat!
Love this coat! When you put it on you can feel the workmanship and the quality of the brand.  Great price.

I was duped the picture online of my coat was Long calf length l received a short coat, your advertising is false. The picture is a lady with a long coat l thought that’s what l was ordering , very disappointed would like to return coat
Beautiful coat

I was a little Leary about ordering this coat after I read reviews on it, but the color and size was just beautiful. Some comments were about the sides were the belt goes how alarming it is. But I went and looked this coat on different sites and blew the image up and it was made just like every belt I looked at.

评论概述: Dirty matted coat, not sure what to think.
评论详情: For size reference I have two other Cole haan coats, and this coat seems to run a half size smaller. I’d size up. I’m usually an 8 in Cole haan, I ordered a 10. I’d get a 12 next time.  Unfortunately I received a coat that was filthy. The tags were still on it. But it looked like it was dragged before shipment. Disappointed.

This jacket was sold everywhere this season but I was not shopping brick and mortar this season so I can’t confirm that this is the same as others. The coat came is a wrinkle ball, not like the other coats I bought to try along with this one. It may contribute to the look of poor quality but it was not that nice of a coat. The material was not that great, a little on the thin side. I sent it back.
Love everything about this coat!!!! Perfect thickness, fit, and look.
Beautiful color and material but I ended up returning this item as it fit very large through the waist.

评论概述: The front lapels are larger than I expected.
评论详情: The front lapels are larger than I expected. I returned it. It was nice quality and would be a moderately warm coat

评论概述: It is NOT a Cole Haan!
评论详情: This was not a Cole Hanan jacket! It’s a rip off and not the original DO NOT purchase! I’m returning cause I paid over $150 for a cheap knock off!
the condition says new but the belt was torn up?? ugh I love the color and coat but sad it was kind of damaged.
color y tela

评论概述: Same as what I tried on at Macy's
评论详情: I'm 5'2" 110lbs, size 4 fits well. Hits me at the bottom of knee cap. Only has one button at the waist, not warm at all.

Even though it's 75 degrees inside my home I can't stop wearing it. It's so luxurious and the quality is top notch. The jacket itself is very roomy on the inside so you may want to size down one if you want a more snug fit.  5 ft 4 inches 170 pounds with most of my weight around my mid section the size 14 fits great but I could have also gone with the size 12.
It was not what I expected! Especially because of the name. I purchased other items from them & was pleased. The material was in JT on my skin when I tried it on. Sent back immediately!
Buy this coat it's a beauty!  True to size.  May go back for another color.  Anyone that that thinks this is a knock-off doesn't know the label.
I love the concept!, but It was soooo small and tight , I’m a size 2, and I could not button it, sad.

评论概述: A unique, elegant, luxury coat from Cole Haan!
评论详情: This is a good weight, warm and high quality coat. You can tell the difference when wearing it. Many reviews have complained about the thin straps which secure the belt... It does not bother me at all. They are thin and inconspicuous, also they perform their function just fine. Let me tell you, this coat will make you feel expensive! All of my girlfriends "ran" online to order theirs after seing it on me!

I am in love with this coat! The color is gorgeous, the quality is superb, the thickness is exactly as expected (has some weight to it), and the overall description is exactly in point. Well worth the price! Highly recommend!

评论概述: Looks like money—but not 4 me. Maybe 4 U?
评论详情: This is one beautiful coat, but large in shoulders and arms. And the blue didn’t look good (on me, anyway). I wouldn’t call it Ice Blue; more like a Sky Blue? But it’s very well made, nice fabric. I’m sorry it didn’t work for me!
Saw this for almost $500 at Macy's and didn't believe it was the same coat...took a chance and it is EXACTLY the same one- love it and I get so many compliments on it.
Beautiful coat!  Dressy.  Quality.  A good purchase.
This is beautiful and sooooo stylish! Thank you!!! 🥰
Tight around the shoulders. Even tried the next size up and had the same issues
This is a beautifully executed  coat, true to color as indicated, at a great sale price.  Packaging was worthy of a designer piece. Very happy with purchase.
Love this coat. Saw it on an actress on TV. Looks exactly like it. Fits true to size.

This was exactly what I was looking for and it had sold out at my regular department store. I tried other similar styles that were more expensive, but the quality and styling was not as good. So so happy!
Coat arrived quickly despite the holidays and is strikingly beautiful.  Our daughter wore it out immediately after receiving it as a gift.
I absolutely love this coat. Everyone always compliments me when i wear it
I love this coat. Very warm and cozy. Looks very elegant. I have lots of compliments every time I wear it. Very good quality. Fitting is perfect.
Love this coat.
Purchased the ice blue color in size 6.  I absolutely love it!  Looks so chic and fits perfectly.
It fit perfect! Love the color

I ordered this coat in size 6 (usual size) through Macy’s on sale for about $200. The coat was slightly too large and based on the style, it almost looked like a bathrobe when not fitted. I went back to Macy’s to order size 4 and was so disappointed when they were sold out. I quickly did a google search, and sure enough it was on Amazon for even less $. I was skeptical because of a few reviews that mentioned this was not the same coat as sold through Macy’s. Don’t be fooled. They are identical! You can see in the picture the 2 coats next to one another (Macy’s & amazon). I receive compliments on this coat every time I wear it. Color is beautiful. You won’t regret buying!
True to size and beautiful color.  But shawl collar and tie belt made it look more like a bathrobe than a coat.  Not the look for me.
Great classic style and good quality. My only complaint is the sleeves are a little short. I plan to have a tailor lengthen them and then it should be prefect!

This coat fits as expected and it's Cole Haan Signature brand. Only downside is the belt holder is legit two pieces of string so I feel like its definitely going to need reinforcement. Other than that its perfect and you can't beat the price its offered for on Amazon.
It’s a real. Fits as expected.
GORGEOUS coat!! Love it!
This is NOT a knock off. Macy’s has exact coat same price same style numbers. Another purchaser said she took it to Macy’s and found same thing I did. Very real Cole Haan
Beautiful color, fabric very nice.  Love the style.

评论概述: Real deal, beautiful coat with the worst "belt loops"
评论详情: This coat is the same one being sold at Nordstrom - you can watch a video there featuring the coat and the lining is a solid color. It's a quality mid-weight coat and the bordeaux color is deep and lovely. My only beef with this coat is that the belt loops are thin string. You have to be very careful not to tear them and I do think it cheapens the look a little. A 2 fits like an extra small. I am on the petite side and it just fits - the sleeves even hit perfectly which is rare for me and makes me think it may run a bit small on others. At 5'4" the coat hits just below my knees.

Because of the price and previous review I was very suspicious this was a knock off. I was so suspicious that after I bought it I took it to Macy’s to compare it with the one in store. It was exactly the same and is a real Cole Haan. The lining, weight of the material, tag, color and texture of the  fabric all 100% matched. This is a great deal and saved me a almost $100 from the on in store.
Was in doubt after seeing the first review, but decided to try it. Can’t exactly know if it’s original or not, but looks exactly like the one in Macy’s. Would recommend.

I was skeptical about ordering this coat based off the previous rating, but it is real Cole Haan. I almost bought this coat for double the amount from Macy's so I am glad I found it on here! I bought it in a size 4 and it fit as expected. It looks elegant and classy. I would recommend it!

This is absolutely great quality for what you pay, and the colour is so attractive. I literally do not have any complaints with this coat, and have gotten so many compliments and wear out of it - I hope to wear it for another 10 years!
Very happy with fit and colour The package left the coat wrinkled

This is a great piece.  Fits true to size and the wool is so soft it looks and feels like cashmere.  Lined on the inside with enough structure around the shoulders to look tailored.  It looks like a much more expensive item - well worth the price!
Good quality
This coat fits well and is warm. Very fashionable! Love it!
